business.headline: Swiggy likely to increase delivery charge on Instamart orders: ReportCurrently, Swiggy subsidises delivery fees through its loyalty program, Swiggy One, and discounts for new users. While delivery is free for Swiggy One members, other customers pay a dynamic fee.

Swiggy share price jumps 7% after Q2 results. Should you buy or avoid?The new-listed company reported a revenue increase of 11.77% quarter-on-quarter (QoQ) to Rs 3,601.45 crore and a year-on-year (YoY) growth of 30.33%. However, the company posted a consolidated net loss of Rs 625.53 crore.

Explained: Why Reliance Power share price hit upper circuit todayReliance Power share price has gained nearly 72% year-to-date, outperforming the Nifty 50's 13% rise, although it faced declines of over 12% in October and 9% in November.

NTPC Green Energy shares climb 44% post-listing. What's driving the rally?NTPC Green Energy share price: The company launched a Rs 10,000 crore IPO last month, which was open for subscription between November 19 and November 22.
Sensex, Nifty open higher driven by IT stocks; Wipro gains nearly 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was up 289.13 points to 81,134.88, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 81 points to 24,538.15.

They can log in to either the BSE website or the website of Kfin Technologies Limited, the registrar for the issue.

NPS Vatsalya: Key benefits, investments, and withdrawal rules explained NPS Vatsalya, launched in September, enables guardians to secure a child's financial future with regulated investments, early savings benefits, and partial withdrawal options until age 18.
Swiggy Q2 results: Net loss narrows to Rs 625.5 crore in 1st earnings after IPOSwiggy's revenue from operations rose by 30% year-on-year (YoY) to Rs 3,601 crore, up from Rs 2,763 crore in Q2FY24.
Sensex, Nifty end higher as banking stocks rally; SBI gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was up 597.67 points to close at 80,845.75, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 181.10 points to end at 24,457.15.

Elon Musk's $56 billion Tesla pay rejected by US court againThe court upheld its earlier ruling from January, which called the compensation plan excessive and rescinded it, despite Tesla shareholders voting in June to reinstate it.

I was as explicit as I could be: Binance CEO on WazirX hackBinance CEO Changpeng Zhao addressed the WazirX hack on X, emphasising Binance's non-involvement, as users seek answers to their frozen funds.
Explained: Why HDFC Bank share price gained 2% today HDFC Bank shares rose 2% in early trade to touch a day high of Rs 1,837. At 1:34 pm, the stock was trading 1.25% higher at Rs 1,827.10.
Housing prices rise 11% across top Indian cities. Is your city on the list?The average housing price across eight major cities now stands at Rs 11,000 per square foot, according to a report.

Sensex soars over 500 points: 3 factors behind stock market rallyThe S&P BSE Sensex rose 562.95 points to reach 80,811.03 at 12:55 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 climbed 152.15 points to 24,425.85. Broader market indices also traded in the green, reflecting widespread optimism across sectors.

Why Ola Electric share price jumped today? 3 factors behind strong rally Ola Electric Stock Price: Over the past five trading sessions, Ola Electric shares have gained nearly 28%, recovering sharply from their 52-week low of Rs 66.60.

Explained: Why Swiggy share price gained in early trade todaySwiggy's share price jumped over 9% to reach a day high of Rs 542.10, marking a 39% gain over its issue price of Rs 390. At 11:07 am, the stock was trading 3.36% higher at Rs 512 on the Bombay Stock Exchange.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Devendra Fadnavis to be Maharashtra Chief Minister, name cleared at BJP meetDevendra Fadnavis to take oath as Maharashtra Chief Minister tomorrow, name cleared at key BJP meet

Former terrorist opens fire at Sukhbir Badal at Golden Temple, overpoweredSukhbir Badal attacked: The incident happened when Sukhbir Badal was serving as a guard at the Golden Temple entrance as part of a religious punishment. The shooter has been identified as Narain Chaura, a former Babbar Khalsa International (BKI) terrorist.

Huge jam as Rahul, Priyanka Gandhi stopped at Delhi-UP border on way to SambhalSambhal authorities requested neighbouring districts stop Rahul Gandhi and Congress leaders at borders and closely monitor their journey to Sambhal.

Why no dialogue with farmers, Jagdeep Dhankar asks Shivraj Chouhan on stageFarmers Protest: Drawing a parallel to Sardar Patel's efforts in unifying India, Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar called on Agriculture Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan to prioritise addressing farmers' concerns, emphasising that their resolution is as crucial as the nation's unification.

Amaze 2024 loses out on these things that you get in new DzireNew Honda Amaze, the third-generation avatar of the compact sedan, will enter the Indian market today. Its prime rival will be the 2024 Maruti Suzuki Dzire.

We don't talk anymore: Harbhajan Singh on relationship with MS DhoniFormer India spinner Harbhajan Singh has said that he does not talk to MS Dhoni. In a shocking claim, Harbhajan has said that friendship is a two-way street, and he only rings up people who pick up his calls.

UK travel advisory for Bangladesh: Terrorists likely to carry out attacksIn a fresh travel advisory issued on Tuesday, the UK government said that terrorist attacks in Bangladesh "could be indiscriminate, including in places visited by foreign nationals, such as crowded areas, religious buildings, and political rallies.

12 hours that shook South Korea: Martial law imposed, overturned and lifted. A timelineSouth Korea Martial Law: In an emergency late-night session, 190 of 300 lawmakers from both ruling and opposition parties unanimously voted to reject the martial law.

Naga Chaitanya will marry Sobhita Dhulipala at 8.15 pm todayNaga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala will get married today, December 14, in Hyderabad. The intimate wedding ceremony will see family members and close friends in attendance.

Video: Man drives Thar at high speed on footpath to record reel, UP Police reactsThe driver, allegedly performing the stunt to create a reel, not only endangered pedestrians but also violated multiple traffic laws.

64-year-old US woman, looking for her cat, feared swallowed by sinkholeElizabeth Pollard, 64, has been missing since going out Monday evening to search for Pepper, her cat. Police found Pollard's car near a restaurant and her 5-year-old granddaughter was found safe inside the car.

On Raj Kapoor's birth centenary, watch his timeless classics in theatres for Rs 100Raj Kapoor's centenary will be celebrated with a grand retrospective showcasing ten iconic films across 40 cities in India, from December 13 to December 15. Movie tickets will be priced at Rs 100.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP.
